job_title: REMOTE BUSINESS ANALYST WITH UKG KRONOS EXPERIENCE

job_details.duration: 1 year initially with potential to go 2-3 years total

jd: From: Maseera Khan, Absolute IT maseera@absoluting.com Reply to: maseera@absoluting.com Candidate must have a good experience working with UKG Kronos (REQUIRED!!)Company: TJXLocation: 400 Value Way, Marlborough, MA 01752 – prefers local but open to remoteDuration: 1 year initially with potential to go 2-3 years totalStart: ASAPInterview process: potentially 2 panel rounds/Offer..Important SkillsTechnical – Word, Excel, and PowerPointSoft – Can work independently, handle high volume/fast paced environment Manager Meeting:• No live intake call• Potential to extend• Updating software from Workforce Central to PRO○ End of life for current software is March 2027• Fully remote• 5-10 years experience• Not a lot of analytics will be involved; more project management tasks• Open to contract and contract to perm talent○ Manager is looking for someone who is going to stay on for the life of the project which is estimated to be March 2027 Top items:○ Strong communication skills (written and verbal)○ Detail oriented○ PP experience (must be able to initiate a deck)○ Long term job experiences○ Software project experienceUpdating software from Workforce Central to PRO (this specific software experience is a plus, not required)
